nodes.documentation:
@dev Must send the amount at stake.
@param _c1Hash Must be equal to keccak256(c1,salt) where c1 is the move of the j1

@dev Should be called by j2(player 2) and provided stake
@param _c2 The move submitted by j2
nodes.name: play
solve

nodes.documentation: @dev Let j2(player 2) get the funds back if j1(player 1) did not play
nodes.name: j1Timeout

nodes.documentation: @dev Let j1 take back the funds if j2 never play
nodes.name: j2Timeout
win
